query: SHOW CONSTRAINTS;

name: Full Graph
query: MATCH path = (:Framework {framework_id: "ISO27001_2022"})-[*]->() RETURN path

name: Get all Control
query:
MATCH (co:Control) 
WHERE co.framework_id = 
"ISO27001_2022"
RETURN co.control_id,co.control_name

name: Get all Category Relations
query:
MATCH (c:ControlCategory) 
WHERE c.framework_id = 
"ISO27001_2022"
RETURN c.category_id,c.category_name

name: Control category Relations - name
query:
// replace <control_category_name>
MATCH path = (cc:ControlCategory {category_name: "<control_category_name>"})-[*]->()
WHERE cc.framework_id = "ISO27001_2022"
RETURN path

name: Control Category - ID
query:
// replace ,<control_category_id
MATCH path = (cc:ControlCategory {category_id:"<control_category_id>"})-[*]->()
WHERE cc.framework_id = "ISO27001_2022"
RETURN path

name: Get all Clause Relations
query:
MATCH (cl:Clause) 
WHERE cl.framework_id = 
"ISO27001_2022"
RETURN cl.clause_id,cl.title

name: Clause relations - Title
Clause relations - ID
query:
//replace <clause_id>
MATCH path = (c:Clause {clause_id:"<clause_id>"})-[*]->()
WHERE c.framework_id = "ISO27001_2022" AND c.category = "<category>"
RETURN path

name: Full Graph
query: MATCH path = (:Framework {framework_id: "HIPAA"})-[*]->() RETURN path

name: Get all standards
query:
MATCH (s:Standard)
WHERE s.framework_id = "HIPAA" AND s.standard_id IS NOT NULL
RETURN DISTINCT s.standard_id AS id, s.type AS type

name: Standard - ID
query:
MATCH (s:Standard) 
WHERE s.framework_id = "HIPAA"
RETURN s.standard_id

name: Standard - Type
query:
MATCH (s:Standard) 
WHERE s.framework_id = "HIPAA"
RETURN s.type

name: Get all Mappings
query:
MATCH (m:Mapping)
WHERE m.framework_id = "HIPAA" AND m.mapping_id IS NOT NULL
RETURN DISTINCT m.mapping_id AS id, m.type AS type

name: Mapping - ID
query:
MATCH (m:Mapping) 
WHERE m.framework_id = "HIPAA"
RETURN m.mapping_id

name: Mapping - Type
query:
MATCH (m:Mapping) 
WHERE m.framework_id = "HIPAA"
RETURN m.type

name: Full Graph
query: MATCH path = (:Standard {standard_id: "HITRUST"})-[*]->() RETURN path

name: Get all standards
query:
MATCH (s:Standard)
WHERE s.standard_id = "HITRUST" AND s.type IS NOT NULL
RETURN DISTINCT s.standard_name AS name, s.type AS type , s.version AS version

name: Standard - Name
query:
MATCH (s:Standard) 
WHERE s.standard_id = "HITRUST"
RETURN s.standard_name

name: Standard - type
query:
MATCH (s:Standard) 
WHERE s.standard_id = "HITRUST"
RETURN s.type

name: Standard - version
query:
MATCH (s:Standard) 
WHERE s.standard_id = "HITRUST"
RETURN s.version

name: Get all categories
query:
MATCH (c:Category)
WHERE c.standard_id = "HITRUST"  AND c.name IS NOT NULL
RETURN DISTINCT c.name AS Category_name, c.category_id AS Category_id

name: Category - Name
query:
MATCH (c:Category) 
WHERE c.standard_id = "HITRUST"
RETURN c.name

name: Category - ID
query:
MATCH (c:Category) 
WHERE c.standard_id = "HITRUST"
RETURN c.category_id

name: Get all Controls
query:
MATCH (ctrl:Control)
WHERE ctrl.standard_id = "HITRUST"  AND ctrl.name IS NOT NULL
RETURN DISTINCT ctrl.name AS Control_name, ctrl.control_id AS Control_id

name: Control - Name
query:
MATCH (ctrl:Control) 
WHERE ctrl.standard_id = "HITRUST" 
RETURN ctrl.name

name: Control - ID
query:
MATCH (ctrl:Control) 
WHERE ctrl.standard_id = "HITRUST" 
RETURN ctrl.control_id

name: Get all ControlObjectives
query:
MATCH (co:ControlObjective)
WHERE co.standard_id = "HITRUST"  AND co.control_id IS NOT NULL
RETURN DISTINCT co.control_id AS ControlObjective_id, co.description AS Control_description

name: ControlObjectives  - ID
query:
MATCH (co:ControlObjective) 
WHERE co.standard_id = "HITRUST"
RETURN co.control_id AS ControlObjective_id

name: ControlObjective - Description
query:
MATCH (co:ControlObjective) 
WHERE co.standard_id = "HITRUST"
RETURN co.description AS ControlObjective_description

name: Get all ControlSpecification
query:
MATCH (cs:ControlSpecification)
WHERE cs.standard_id = "HITRUST"  AND cs.control_id IS NOT NULL
RETURN DISTINCT cs.control_id AS ControlObjective_id, cs.description AS Control_description

MATCH (cs:ControlSpecification)

name: ControlSpecification - Description
